name: pr-approval-finder
description: Find minimum required approvals for GitHub Pull Requests

scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint:fix" "cd server && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd client && npm run format" "cd server && npm run format"
scripts.format:check: concurrently "cd client && npm run format:check" "cd server && npm run format:check"
scripts.code:fix: concurrently "cd client && npm run code:fix" "cd server && npm run code:fix"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && npm test" "cd server && npm test"
scripts.pre-commit: npm run format && npm run lint

author: Aswin
